glsa.title: SpamAssassin: Long URI Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: SpamAssassin is vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack.

background.p: SpamAssassin is an extensible email filter used to identify junk email.

description.p: SpamAssassin does not correctly handle very long URIs when scanning emails.

impact.p: An attacker could cause SpamAssassin to consume large amounts of CPU and memory resources by sending one or more emails containing very long URIs.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All SpamAssassin users should upgrade to the latest version.
